#summary wiki page for all date and time related questions and resources

= Date and Time =

Date and Time related problematic. How to deal with user's timezone (localization)? How not to be forced to use server timestamp? NNTP Server?

= PHP =

Globally read [http://www.php.net/manual/en/refs.calendar.php Date and Time Related Extensions]. 
 * [http://www.php.net/manual/en/timezones.php List of Supported Timezones]
 * latest version of the [http://www.php.net/manual/en/timezones.php timezonedb] (via PECL's)
 * *[http://ch2.php.net/manual/en/ref.datetime.php PHP Date/Time Functions]*
 * [http://www.php.net/manual/en/function.date-sunrise.php date_sunrise()] and [http://www.php.net/manual/en/function.date-sunset.php date_sunset()]
 * [http://ch2.php.net/manual/en/class.datetimezone.php PHP timezones handlings]
 * PEAR [http://pear.php.net/manual/en/package.datetime.date.php Date.php]: examples using the extension [http://pear.php.net/manual/en/package.datetime.date.examples.php  here] and [http://www.builderau.com.au/program/php/soa/Get-the-correct-time-by-converting-between-time-zones-with-PHP-and-PEAR/0,339028448,339273806,00.htm# here]
 * Zend Framework
   * [http://framework.zend.com/manual/en/zend.date.html Zend_Date] for date manipulation. [http://www.wowww.ch/index.php?post/2008/12/25/Zend-Framework-Zend-Date-performance-et-contre-performance Comments on Zend_date()]
   * [http://framework.zend.com/manual/en/zend.locale.html Zend_Locale] for conversion between locales. Dates and times manipulations [http://framework.zend.com/manual/en/zend.locale.date.datesandtimes.html here]
= Symfony =
  * Discussion about usage of timezones [http://groups.google.com/group/symfony-users/browse_thread/thread/e00be755e772c9df here] and continued [http://groups.google.com/group/symfony-users/browse_thread/thread/9e73abae893f2aa2 here]

  * [http://trac.symfony-project.org/browser/branches/1.3/lib/widget/i18n/sfWidgetFormI18nChoiceTimezone.class.php Timezone choice widget]

= MySQL =

  * [http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.0/en/time-zone-support.html MySQL timezone support] and [http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.1/en/date-and-time-functions.html Date and Time functions]
  * [http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1003171/why-not-use-mysqls-timestamp-across-the-board Here] other storage formats than timestamp are suggested.
  * Be carful when using [http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.1/en/date-and-time-functions.html#function_unix-timestamp UNIX_TIMESTAMP()] MySQL function

= PHP and MySQL = 

  * [http://jokke.dk/blog/2007/07/timezones_in_mysql_and_php This] is a tutorial explaining how to handle timezones between PHP and MySQL. Read also the comments.
  * [http://www.sjhannah.com/blog/?p=113 This] and [http://www.ultramegatech.com/blog/2009/04/working-with-time-zones-in-php this] are possible solution to handle timezones
